Background

Sara migrated to Boston from DC in 2007. Her varied experience in finance, life sciences, and administration gives her a unique perspective when it comes to marketing projects. She believes you can accomplish anything if you gauge and target your audience, impute your message in everything you do, and build a supportive community.
